meta.title: Golden Retriever vs Bernese Mountain Dog: Gentle Giants
meta.description: Golden Retriever vs Bernese Mountain Dog. Comparing two of the most affectionate family dogs. Size, lifespan, and shedding differences.

h1: Golden Retriever vs Bernese Mountain Dog

comparison_points.title: Size
comparison_points.verdict: Berners are significantly larger and stronger.

comparison_points.title: Lifespan
comparison_points.verdict: Goldens typically live longer than Berners.

comparison_points.title: Energy
comparison_points.verdict: Berners are calmer indoors but still need exercise.
